sentences.english: It is not feasible to wit four days until the body is used to new time zone.
sentences.chinese: 等上四天知道身體習慣新的時區是不可行的。

sentences.english: The U.S. didn't sign its time zones into law until 1918.
sentences.chinese: 美國直到1918年才把時區寫入法律。

sentences.english: Describes how to work with time zones and time zone conversions in time zone-aware applications.
sentences.chinese: 描述如何在時區識別應用程序中處理時區和時區轉換。

sentences.english: Describes how to work with time zones and time zone conversions in time zone-aware applications.
sentences.chinese: 描述如何在時區識別應用程序中處理時區和時區轉換。

sentences.english: Describes how to work with time zones and time zone conversions in time zone-aware applications.
sentences.chinese: 描述如何在時區識別應用程序中處理時區和時區轉換。

sentences.english: Explorers and tourists find their directions with the aids of compass and timekeeper.
sentences.chinese: 有了指南針和時區定位，探險家和遊人不再迷路。

sentences.english: Can I change the time zone MT4 platform?
sentences.chinese: 是否可以更改MT4平臺中的時區？

sentences.english: Let's make a meeting next Monday at 5:30 PM SLC time.
sentences.chinese: 下週一鹽湖鄉時區下晝五點半開會。

sentences.english: China and India are cases in point, where there is one time zone from East to West.
sentences.chinese: 中國和印度就是如此，兩國從東到西都只有一個時區。

sentences.english: Let’s make a meeting next Monday at 5:30 PM SLC time.
sentences.chinese: 下週一鹽湖城時區下午五點半開會。

sentences.english: One of the major concerns here is time zone.
sentences.chinese: 這裏最主要的考慮是時區問題。

sentences.english: Automation can also help overcome delays due to time zone differences.
sentences.chinese: 自動化還可以幫助克服由於時區差異造成的延遲。

sentences.english: The zone boundaries zigzag capriciously according to the whims of the local population.
sentences.chinese: 按照當地居民的意願，時區界線被劃分得彎彎曲曲。

sentences.english: Adjust all clocks at mid-night by zone time signal.
sentences.chinese: 在午夜用時區信號調準所有時鐘。

sentences.english: We also carry out period-end closing and plan with different time-horizons.
sentences.chinese: 我們還執行期末關賬，並按照不同的時區做計劃。

definition: in (some place)/to be in (adversity, a difficult situation, danger, turmoil etc)/to find oneself in/placed in/surrounded by
to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
time interval/work shift/time slot/the twelve two-hour divisions of the day
to switch over/to switch modes or data streams/to cut (to a new scene)
speech sounds/pronunciation/colloquial (rather than literary) pronunciation of a Chinese character/phonetic/audio/voice/(Internet) to voice chat/voice message

local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
